reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, with a true-to-size fit and soft material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and quality
items.body: Confy- great soft fabric, elegant! True to size Read more
items.author: Pant are not what they appear on pictures. It fits bigger. The material is linen, not at all what it looks like in picture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and warm sweater!
items.body: The quality of the sweater is top rated! Soft, stylish, and fits true to size. I love the color, rich and has not faded. I highly recommend this sweater and this brand: PRETTYGARDEN. They never disappoint! Read more
items.author: AmazonAddict

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like it
items.body: Color is pretty, but piling is noticeable Read more
items.author: sydnie nailor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, beautiful sweater
items.body: Beautiful, comfortable sweater! The material is very soft and warm. I love the deep chocolate brown color too! Would highly recommend this sweater to anyone. I am most assuredly pleased with this garment and the reasonable price I paid.. Read more
items.author: Brenda Eddy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not look like picture
items.body: Sweater is not as thick as it appears. The details are not raised as they appear in photo. The turtleneck is no where near as high as shown. This a "lightweight" sweater and the picture is very deceiving as far as quality. Watch the videos before purchase, something I wish I did. They show what it truly looks like. The enhanced picture they show is not what it looks like at all. Read more
items.author: Tom Rose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater! The quality is amazing. The thickness of the material is perfect and it is snag resistant which I love. The color is so pretty I get compliments every time I wear it! Read more
items.author: Sarah Angell

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Pilling
items.body: Although I was happy with the color, fit, and weight of the sweater it began pilling after wearing it one time. I have reached out to the seller and I am waiting for a response. I will update my review accordingly. Read more
items.author: Marybeth S

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabric not very durable
items.body: It looks nice but fabric doesn't seem like it's going to hold up and yarn gets picked very easily. Read more
items.author: Anna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
